event_details.title: CMT Mumbai Chapter Meeting
event_details.description: Join us for an engaging session on technical analysis in modern markets. Our expert speakers will cover advanced charting techniques, risk management strategies, and the latest market trends. This workshop is designed for both beginners and experienced traders looking to enhance their analytical skills.

speakers.name: Rajesh Kumar
speakers.bio: Senior Technical Analyst with over 15 years of experience in equity markets. Former head of research at leading brokerage firms and author of multiple research papers on market dynamics.
speakers.title: Senior Technical Analyst

speakers.name: Priya Sharma
speakers.bio: Derivatives expert specializing in options strategies and volatility analysis. Regular speaker at financial conferences and mentor to upcoming analysts.
speakers.title: Head of Derivatives
